Text: Good quality TVrips. If they were DVDrips they wouldn't be censored.

The DVDs for Season 3-7 were censored (read the Amazon reviews), while 1-2 were uncensored (save for a few episodes in the S2 set). The reason was that two different companies released the DVDs. One used the original uncensored versions, while the other used the syndicated, censored versions.
Thanks for the upload....great tv show!
